block.p: Recent Sale $31.6 million Crosswest Office Center 399 Knollwood Road White Plains A real estate investment company has bought this 1986 four-story, 146,125-square-foot office building, near Exit 4 of Interstate 287. Buyer: SL Green Seller: RPW Group Brokers: Andrew Merin and Patrick Colwell, Cushman & Wakefield

Recent Lease $35/sq. ft. approximate annual rent $88,000 444 Park Avenue South (at 30th Street) Manhattan An Indian global outsourcing firm, which provides services for the financial industry and research firms, has taken 2,500 square feet on the 12th floor of this 13-story building. Tenant: Adventity Inc. Tenant brokers: Marc S. Miller and Erica Rubinstein, Miller & Partners Landlord: GMD Realty Inc. Landlord broker: Alex DeFortuna, Hudson Realty Enterprises Ltd.

For Sale or Lease $1.6 million or for lease for about $135,000 a year with a 10-year lease 26 Beaver Street (between Broad and New Streets) Manhattan A 2,518-square-foot retail co-op encompassing the ground floor and a mezzanine is available in this 19-story residential building built in 1909 in the financial district. Owner: Beaver Tower Inc. Broker: Harris C. Bulow, Signature Partners L.L.C.
